content: दुःख {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [दुष्टानि खानि यास्मिन्, दुष्टं खनति खन्-ड, दुःख् अच् वा <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Painful, disagreeable, unpleasant; सिंहानां निनदा दुःखाः श्रोतुं दुःखमतो वनं <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--2@} Difficult, uneasy. --खं {@--1@} Sorrow, grief, unhappiness, distress, pain, agony; सुखं हि दुःखान्यनुभूय शोभते <ls>Mk. 1. 10</ls>; यदेवोपनतं दुःखात्सुखं तद्रसवत्तरं <ls>V. 3. 21</ls>; so दुःखसुख, समदुःखसुख &c. {@--2@} Trouble, difficulty; <ls>Ś. Til. 12</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 163.</ls> (दुःखं and दुःखेन are used as adverbs in the sense of ‘hardly’, ‘with great difficulty or trouble’ <ls>Ś. 7. 13</ls>; <ls>Bg. 12. 5</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 13</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1.</ls>; <ls>R. 19</ls>, <ls n="R.">49</ls>; <ls>H. 1. 158</ls>).
